pages.text: • Please note that the current version of the modpack is still early, and you might encounter $(k)problems$() and issues.$(br)Please make sure to report any issue you encounter,$(br)with game logs, to $(l:getting_support)get support$().$(br)• Along with this book, you will receive the Akashic Tome, preloaded with all of the mod guide books. Open and choose a guide book to read, then simply point it at the air$(br)  and left-click to reset!
